songs.lyrics:
It's time to chase your dreams
Up out ya seats, make your body sway
Socialize, get down, let your soul lead the way
Shake it now, go ladies, it's a livin' dream
Love, life, live
Come play the game, our world is free
Do what you want but scream

Zih zih zih zih zih, zih zih zih
Zih zih zih zih zih
Zih zih zih zih zih, zih zih zih zih zih

Everybody say, rock it, don't stop it (rock it, don't stop it)
Everybody say, shock it and pop it
Everybody say, ichi ni san chi
Say, Planet Rock
It's the sure shot
Say, Planet Rock

Party people
Party people
Can y'all get funky?
Soul Sonic Force, can y'all get funky?
The Zulu Nation, can y'all get funky?
Yeah, just hit me
Just taste the funk and hit me
Just get on down and hit me
Bambaataa's gettin' so funky, now, hit me
Yeah, just hit me

We know a place where the nights are hot, it is a house of funk
Females and males both headed all for the disco
The DJ plays your favorite blast, takes you back to the past, music's magic
Bump bump bump get bump with some flash, people
Twist and turn, then you let your body slide
You got the body rock and pop, bounce and pounce
Everybody just rock it and don't stop it
You gotta rock it, don't stop
Keep tickin' and tockin', work it all around the clock
Everybody keep rockin'
songs.title: Planet Rock (KAYTRANADA Planet Invasion Remix)
